text:
...Mamimi, it's almost time to head out.
Could you start moving, please?
I think it'll be fine to hang around a bit longer though.

If there ends up being any trouble you'll be late, won't you?
If there were a traffic jam or something.

So you should always plan to leave a little extra time.
It'd be bad if you were late for a job, wouldn't it?

Well, work is important but
idle time is also important you know.

I understand the feeling... In that case, would you be okay
lazing around in the car on the way to the next job?

I guess so.
If that's the only option, I'll go with that.

── Alright, in that case, start getting ready.
It'll be rough if we don't make it in time.
